```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(naniar)
library(janitor)
library(shiny)
library(paletteer)
```

```{r}
turtles<-read.csv(here("Final Project","Turtle_data.csv"))
#turtles
#view(turtles)
```


```{r}
turtles%>%
  naniar::miss_var_summary()
```
```{r}
turtles%>%
  tabyl(Species)
```
```{r}
turtles%>%
  group_by(Species)%>%
  summarise(across(contains("CL"),mean,na.rm=T))
```
```{r}
turtles%>%
  filter(Species=="")
```

```{r}
turtles%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  count(Dead_Alive)
```
```{r}
turtles%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,fill=Dead_Alive))+
  geom_bar(position = "dodge")
```
```{r}
turtles%>%
  filter(Dead_Alive=="")
```

```{r}
turtles_tidy<-turtles%>%
  mutate_all(tolower)
```

```{r}
turtles_tidy%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  filter(Dead_Alive!="")%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,fill=Dead_Alive))+
  geom_bar(position = "dodge")+
  labs(title = "Number of Dead and Live Captures per Year",x="year",y="Number of Dead or Live Captures")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60,hjust = 1))
```
```{r}
turtles%>%
  group_by(Species)%>%
  summarise(mean_SCL_tip=mean(SCL_tip,na.rm=T))
```


```{r}
turtles%>%
  filter(Gear!="")%>%
  tabyl(Gear,Species)
```
```{r}
turtles%>%
  filter(Gear!=""&Species!="")%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Gear,fill=Species))+
  geom_bar(position = "dodge")+
  labs(title = "Gear used for Different Spcies",x="Gear",y="Number Captured with Given Method")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60,hjust = 1))
```
